explains: n. 优势；有利情况；有利地位
wordGroup: vantage point n. 有利位置；优势

sentences.en: From a concealed vantage point, he saw a car arrive.
sentences.cn: 从一个隐蔽的有利位置，他看到一辆车到了。

sentences.en: The cafe was a good vantage point for watching the world go by.
sentences.cn: 从这家小餐馆能清楚地看到世事的变迁。

sentences.en: From this vantage point he watched, his searching eye never missing a detail.
sentences.cn: 从这个有利的位置进行观察，他那锐利的目光从未漏掉一个细节。
